nodes.bodyText:
Why the change from code to identifiers?
An identifier is things the user name like classes and variables.
I assume "code" expands to keywords. It is possible to write these keywords with unicode which we don't support.
The following example compiles on Eclipse:
public cl\u0061ss Test {}

but can't pass Checkstyle. It is a unicode character which is what I thought this paragraph was including in its limitation description.
I don't see this change being correct or at the least needs additional expanding.
